company_info.Company Description: We as a dynamic group of experienced and qualified professionals.One of largest industry in pharma

jd_information.description: Responsibilities- • Ability to handle packages (National / International)• Knowledge about national/international vendors for tour packages.• Air Ticketing / hotel bookings• Deals with travel agents or retailers• Making online reservations• Coordinate all travel logistics/Transportation• Guide the travellers through the tour’s itinerary• Co-ordinating with clients for visa documentation and application.• Should be able to convert leads and can do chat and voice call with customers.· Be able to interact and convince corporates for make bookings through our travel agency· Cold calling and fixing meetings – field marketing Skills and competencies- • Have ability to work in team• Good communication skills in English, Hindi and local language• Personally motivated and positive Attitude• Knowledge of computer
